basic_info.summary:
After graduating from the University of Florida, Sean began his career in digital advertising implementing online reputation management for at-risk clients. 
Soon transcending that role, Sean took on the role of Digital Manager for an advertising agency in North Miami where he strategized and executed campaigns across 
PPC, SEO, and social media mediums, utlimately reulting in the tripling of clients' media budgets due to positive ROI. 

Sean has now delved into programming in the hopes of procuring a technical position with more intellectual stimulation where he will be able to grow not just himself, 
but his company as well.

education.details:
Studied English from both an etymological and literay historical perspective. Graduated with 3.5 gpa.

  - Dean's List

experiences.details:
Managed entire client roster from  Fortune 500 companies to small (<$5M) and mid-sized businesses ($5M-$10M).
Strategized, negotiated and executed campaigns across traditional (radio and print) and digital (PPC, SEO, e-mail, etc.) 
mediums.

  - Worked with Carnival Cruise Line as the primary point of contact.
  - Managed agency's internal team to meet deadlines/deliverables and exceed expectations.

Created, executed, and managed all digital campaigns for entire client roster. Digital strategies consisted of
PPC, SEO, e-mail marketing and social media-driven foundations with constant optimization to acheive highest possible ROI while 
communicating brand's story. Wrote all consumer-facing copy for both digital ads as well as traditional
ads as featured by Aventura Magazine and News Aventura.

  - Tripled clients' media budgets with proven lead-generation.
  - Wrote copy for all clients in both digital and traditional mediums.

Personally created and executed SEO branding campaigns for 20-25 high networth accounts producing 150k + in client revenue.

  - Wordpress CMS
  - Produced additional $90k in referral revenue.
